items.sentence: It's a nice country to visit, but I wouldn't live there.
Tom didn't have to call a taxi. Mary called one for him.
If I were a foreigner, I probably couldn't eat raw fish.
As soon as the rain stopped, the tennis match continued.
It took me a little more time than usual to fall asleep.
We have to get him to the hospital before it's too late.
Are you sure you want to move in with your grandparents?
I have no objection to Tom going to Australia with Mary.
I wonder why Tom didn't want to go to Australia with us.
Tom seemed to be unaware that Mary hadn't done that yet.
I don't mean to rush you, but could you please hurry up?
Tom says that he doesn't care whether Mary stays or not.
I'd definitely think about that carefully if I were you.
You shouldn't lose your patience when dealing with kids.
I'll meet you at the station at 2:30 tomorrow afternoon.
Tom started dated Mary not long after he and I broke up.
Our French teacher doesn't use English in the classroom.
Tom believes there is a time and a place for everything.
I just find it hard to believe Tom really believes that.
I don't think that there's any chance Tom will help you.
